content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The purpose of this regulation (hereinafter the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“Regulation”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") is to establish unified rules of conduct for the employees of \\\"EPAM Systems\\\" Limited Liability Company (hereinafter the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“Company”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") in case of working remotely, as well as in case of having a status of homeworker. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
